definition: diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek

sentences.english: Florals are for middle-aged women with weight problems.
sentences.chinese: 大花图案都是为那些有体重问题的中年妇女所准备的。

sentences.english: A layout of an image to be printed such as a book cover .
sentences.chinese: 杂凑而成的东西将要印刷的图案设计，如书的封面。

sentences.english: Hammer and sickle symbols of the industrial worker and the peasant are used as the emblem of the ussr .
sentences.chinese: 代表产业工人和农民的锤子镰刀图案用作前苏联国徽。

sentences.english: Floral wallpaper adorned the walls of the guest room.
sentences.chinese: 客房的墙上裱糊著有花卉图案的壁纸。

sentences.english: Color transfer printing of T-shirt is one of process of textile printing.
sentences.chinese: 彩绘转印是T恤图案印花工艺中的一种。

sentences.english: The image, which measures 200x290 micro-meters, features a Christmas tree, and is etched on a tiny piece of glass.
sentences.chinese: 贺卡上圣诞树的图案是在一小块玻璃上蚀刻而成的。

sentences.english: Dragon robe is the emperor's court dress embroidered with dragon patterns.
sentences.chinese: 皇帝的朝服，上面绣着龙形图案。

sentences.english: These eave tiles are carved with many animal pictures.
sentences.chinese: 这些瓦当上都刻有各种各样的动物图案。

sentences.english: Our airplane had a lotus painted on its tail.
sentences.chinese: 我们的飞机在机尾有莲花的图案。

sentences.english: The design was impressed on the cloth.
It was prettily engraved with flowers on the back.
sentences.chinese: 此件雕刻精美，背面有花饰图案。

sentences.english: Bob: Of course yes, it is tattoo some pictures on the skin.
sentences.chinese: 当然知道，就是在身体上刺上一些图案。

sentences.english: Chinese stitchery, you know, is beautifully patterned and exquisitely embroidered.
sentences.chinese: 你知道，中国刺绣品图案精美，绣工精巧。

sentences.english: Some objects of refined terracotta were decorated with zoomorphic and geometric designs.
sentences.chinese: 细泥陶上常有彩绘的几何图案或动物形花纹。

sentences.english: For heavily brocaded materials, the patterns were created by shuffling through a deck of cards.
sentences.chinese: 对浮花很重的材料，图案由混排一套卡片而织成。

sentences.english: You can't work a fine pattern with a thick needle and wool.
sentences.chinese: 你不能用粗针和毛线绣那样细的图案。

definition: veined pattern/wrinkles/vein lines (in marble or fingerprint)/grain (in wood etc)
the back/the reverse side/the wrong side
